Translations.Text: Icyo ni igitabo (Qur’an) kidashidi- kanywaho, kikaba umuyoboro ku batinya Allah
Babandi bemera ibitagaragara (byahanuwe), bagahozaho amase- ngesho (Swalat) kandi bagatangamu byo twabahaye
Ni nabo bemera ibyo (wowe Muhamadi) wahishuriwe (Qur’an n’imigenzo y’intumwa), bakanemera ibyahishuwe mbere yawe (ibitabo byahishuriwe intumwa zakubanjirije), ndetse bakemera imperuka badashidikanya
Abo ni bo bari mu nzira iboneye yagenwe na Nyagasani wabo, kandi ni bo bakiranutsi
Mu by’ukuri, abahakanye waba- burira utababurira (wowe Muhamadi), byose ni kimwe kuri bo, ntibazemera
Allah yadanangiye imitima yabo n’ukumva kwabo, ndetse no ku maso yabo hari igikingirizo (ibyo byose bituma batemera ukuri), kandi bazahanishwa ibihano bihambaye
